Text: Merry Xmas to  myself and being so stupid to lost two days in encoding this pack - to the people who have downloaded this in dozens - but no fucking soul have thanked.

Dear Bro,
I am not downloading this one, but Still want to say thanks for your work. You always do good man. Dont get dishearted.

Merry Xmas and HNY, wish you have a great year ahead, go on and get a job in Adobe or Maya  :-) hehe.

Takcare man... b4n
^ lol i echo you too.. merry christmas mate..
Merry Xmas to you DZ, thanks again. T
I have not downloaded but nevertheless thank you.

Thanks for the encoding work m8. Really takes alot of tweaking and time to get a movie into such a small package, and still have it look good.

Those encoders with pre set settings for dummies work ok, but usually you need good old tweaking of settings and know-how. Sometimes they even make the portable files larger than the original.

So a big thank you to Twentyforty, for his time and effort. Well done. :-)
